lead_paragraph: When an old high school crush returns to his small hometown, Reed Fish's once simple, calculated life begins to unravel. A drunken incident prompts Reed's fianc‚e (Alexis Bledel) and the entire town to turn against him. This one-of-a-kind hilariousl
